name: MB Advertising & Marketing Ltd
description:
Established in 1989, MB have specialised in providing advertising and marketing services to the automotive industry for over 25 years. As the UK’s leading independent motors agency we will ensure your business growth by providing the very best advice and service. From independent retailers to the top AM 200 dealer groups we have the scale to manage all your marketing needs.
As the UK’s largest independent automotive agency we are uniquely placed to help car, van and truck dealers generate leads to achieve both their profit and manufacturer targets. Whether you are a car supermarket, or represent a volume or a prestige franchise, we will work with you to meet both yours and your manufacturers requirements. The total satisfaction of our clients is paramount to the MB Advertising & Marketing team. Our reputation has been built by delivering award winning service on time every time, and with our focus on customer retention it is no surprise that so much of our new business comes from client referrals.
